tweet.text: We mourn the passing of David C. Humphrey, who contributed to the Foreign Relations series as @USNatArchives archivist with @LBJLibrary and historian at @HistoryAtState. Humphrey has been acknowledged in #FRUS volumes and #HAC meetings: https://t.co/Z64f2pQrmi https://t.co/K7JqtLCmpR
tweet.html: We mourn the passing of David C. Humphrey, who contributed to the Foreign Relations series as @USNatArchives archivist with @LBJLibrary and historian at @HistoryAtState. Humphrey has been acknowledged in #FRUS volumes and #HAC meetings: ow.ly/RuAc50HwZtM
